attributes.action: Put Tony Blair on Trial for Alleged War Crimes and Lying to the British Public
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Allegedly Continually lying to the public of UK
Allegedly Not attending the homecoming of Dead or Injured UK Sodiers he sent to Die.
Allegedly Not Supplying UK troops with adequate personal safety equiptment for the Wars he has involved them in by Alleged deception of UK public.
Allegedly Profiteering from said Wars.
Alleged Tax evasion,how can he afford mortgages to the value of £5million Allegedly that we know of as published in the UK press.
Allegedly  covering up & Colluding with fellow government colleagues Allegedly underhand and possibly Alleged criminal acts.
Alleged peerages for Money.

rejection.details:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/WarCriminalBlair/

we suggest, sir, that you sign this petition which is already up and running
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
